verses.1: Topa aw, nangma leitang na hehpih a, Jakobʼ nopsaknate a ngeina na bangsakkik hi.
verses.2: Na miteʼ mawhna na maisak a, amauʼ khialhna khempeuh na maisak hi.
verses.3: Na hehna khempeuh na damsak a, na sinsona na daisak hi.
verses.4: Kote hong hon khia Pasian aw, kote ka ngei uh hong bangsakkik inla, kote tunga na lungkim lohna hong beisak ta in.
verses.5: Koteʼ tungah heh paisuak ding na hi hiam? Khang tawntungin heh paisuak ding na hi hiam?
verses.6: Kote in nangmah kong phat theih nadingun ko na mite hong nungtasakkik lo ding na hi hiam?
verses.7: Topa aw, kote tungah na itna kip hong lak inla, hong huhin hong hon in.
verses.8: Topa Pasianʼ thugen ding hong zasak dih un. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama lamah lungsim takpi tawh a kihei ama mi siangtho, ama miteʼ tungah kilemna thu a gen ding hi.
verses.9: I gam sungah minthanna a om theih nadingin amah a zahtakte adingin ama hong hotkhiatna hong om takpi hi.
verses.10: Itna kip le thutak kigawm dinga, thuman le kilemna kihual ding uh hi.
verses.11: Leilak panin thutak hong po khia dinga, vantung panin thuman in hong en suk ding hi.
verses.12: Topa in a hoih nate eite tungah hong pia dinga, i leitang in hauhna piangsak ding hi.
verses.13: Topaʼ mai ah thuman na ma pai dinga, ama lampi a bawl khol ding hi.
